attributes.action: recognise and protect albanians living in serbia, especially preshevo, bujanovc and
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
especially preshevo, bujanovc and other albanian cities in serbia.

when kosovo declared independent albanian in preshevo were threated by serbs, the police were hanging around their house treating them like though they the albanians have done something wrong, even though they haven't, they only wanted to celebrate kosovos independence day. this was play on albanian TV in kosovo were serbs were controling that area, and they told the t.v. crow they were threated by serbs. 

please don't let the serbs try to commit another ethnic cleansing in these places, including kosovo

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
